description: A recipe phase that allows operators to attach one or more documents to a specified Lot in the Electronic Batch Record, pre-populates based on configuration, and publishes recipe variables about attached files upon completion.
intent: To enable operators to attach documents to a Lot and to capture attachment metadata for downstream processing.
postconditions: Documents attached to the specified Lot
Recipe variables AttachedFileCount and AttachedFileNames populated
side_effects: Attaches documents to Lot in the EBR
Publishes recipe variables with attachment information
example_usage: Operator executes the Attach Document to Lot phase, enters Lot ID 'Lot1', selects two documents, and finishes to attach the documents and populate attachment variables.
